txt.en: Ingold can be found at the northern gate of the Rammas.\n\nYou should speak with Ingold.
'This is a fine start down the path to victory! There is much more to do though if we are to stand a chance in the days to come.'
Easterlings can be found across the River Forant in southern Talath Anor.\n\nYou should defeat Sûhalar patrols and destroy Easterling barricades.

'This northern army consists of Orcs from Mordor and Sûhalar Easterlings. These strange, axe-wielding Easterlings are a new threat, the likes I have not seen before. If we are to hold the northern gate for the Rohirrim we will need to deal with these northern forces.

'Venture into Talath Anor, the lands north of here and defeat patrols of these Easterling axe-men.

It has also come to my attention that these Easterlings are trying to construct barricades along the Forant River. This should be dealt with as well.'
The discovery of a northern army and strange axe-wielding Easterlings concerns Ingold and threatens his ability to hold the North-gate.
